H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H3448.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Obed<SDBH:עֹובֵד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H5059.def: = action by which humans play an instrument with strings, such as a {L:lute<SDBH:כִּנֹּור>} or {L:lyre<SDBH:נֵבֶל>}, which can be for silent meditation or to accompany singing and dancing

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H995.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H8389.def: = the shape of (part of) the body of humans and animals; ≈ mostly used in contexts emphasizing the beauty of someone's face and figure

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H4397.def: = a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

H3448.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Obed<SDBH:עֹובֵד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H3448.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Obed<SDBH:עֹובֵד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H4997.def: = container ◄ made of a goatskin, the outer side of which has been turned inside; ► used for storing wine or milk

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H5795.def: = a fairly small, female domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and relatively short hair, and usually found in one single {L:flock<SDBH:צֹאן>} with sheep; ► raised for its milk, meat, and skin; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H3448.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Obed<SDBH:עֹובֵד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H2580.def: = state in which someone or something is physically attractive; ► which may bring about a favorable attitude in others

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3658.def: = musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing

H5059.def: = action by which humans play an instrument with strings, such as a {L:lute<SDBH:כִּנֹּור>} or {L:lyre<SDBH:נֵבֶל>}, which can be for silent meditation or to accompany singing and dancing

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
